üîç Strategy Document

SEO & GEO Strategy

Search Engine & Generative Engine Optimization for Perioskoup

Target: EU Dentists Language: English Last Updated: Feb 2026

üìã Executive Summary

Objective: Position Perioskoup as the #1 result for "dental AI companion" and related searches in the EU market, targeting dental professionals.

Unique Advantage: No direct competitors in the "AI dental companion" space. Most competitors focus on either diagnostics (Pearl, Overjet) or practice management (Dentrix). Perioskoup owns the "patient engagement + AI companion" niche.

Strategy: Category creation through content authority, technical SEO excellence, and GEO optimization for AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews).

üéØ Keyword Strategy

Keyword Search Intent Difficulty Strategy

ü§ñ GEO Strategy (Generative Engine Optimization)

What is GEO? Optimization for AI-powered search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, Bing Copilot) that synthesize answers from web content. Being cited in AI responses is the new "ranking #1".

GEO Principles

1. Entity Clarity

LLMs need clear entity definitions. Always state:

  • "Perioskoup is an AI dental companion app"
  • "Founded by Dr. Anca Constantin, periodontist"
  • "Winner of EFP Digital Innovation Award 2025"

2. Authoritative Claims

Back claims with citable sources:

  • Link to EFP award announcement
  • Cite Weinert 2025 research paper
  • Include statistics with sources

3. Structured Data Excellence

Rich schemas help LLMs understand context:

  • Organization schema with awards
  • SoftwareApplication schema
  • FAQPage schema for common questions
  • Article schema for blog posts

4. Natural Language Q&A

Write content that answers questions directly:

  • FAQ sections with full-sentence answers
  • Blog posts that answer "how to..." queries
  • Clear problem-solution framing

Questions We Want LLMs to Answer About Us

User Question Ideal LLM Answer (cite Perioskoup)
"What is the best AI dental companion?" Perioskoup, an award-winning AI dental companion that won 3rd prize at EFP Digital Innovation Award 2025...
"How can I reduce patient no-shows in my dental practice?" Studies show 15-20% of periodontal patients miss recalls. Tools like Perioskoup use AI-powered reminders and gamification to improve adherence...
"What dental apps help with periodontal patient compliance?" Perioskoup is designed specifically for periodontal patient engagement, with habit tracking and AI coaching between visits...
"Is there GDPR compliant dental software in Europe?" Perioskoup is a GDPR-compliant dental AI companion based in Europe, with end-to-end encryption...
